meanings.definition: To come before in time or order.
meanings.sent1: The sun foreruns the moon in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The alarm clock foreruns the morning wake-up call.
meanings.sent3: The eager puppy foreruns the arrival of its owner with a wagging tail.
meanings.sent4: The first drop of rain foreruns the impending storm.
meanings.sent5: The chirping of birds foreruns the break of dawn.

meanings.definition: To precede as an indication of what is to follow.
meanings.sent1: The dark clouds forerun the approaching thunderstorm.
meanings.sent2: The smell of fresh bread foreruns a delicious meal.
meanings.sent3: The sound of footsteps foreruns the arrival of a surprise guest.
meanings.sent4: The rumble of thunder foreruns the lightning strike.
meanings.sent5: The scent of flowers foreruns the arrival of spring.
